# planetscale Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    planetscale = {
      source = "registry.terraform.io/planetscale/planetscale"
    }
  }
}

provider "planetscale" {
  service_token_name = "luq1jk0pjccp"
}
```
